body:
Hi o/
I have decided to post a weekly topic proposing a question to members of the Avicus community to answer. Each week I will ask a different question, there is no right answer. This is simply to keep the forums active and engaged in discussions. 

Question #1-

If you had three wishes, what would they be? 

*Note- You can't wish for more wishes. :P


My answer-
1): End all violence.
2): Stop government monopolies.
3): Put an end to poverty.

replies.body:
Money so I could do all the things I want to do.

Success further down the road with a career.

A time machine, so I could visit all of history in person.

EDIT: Never mind, I'm scrapping the time machine one. I want free downloads to every single song for life

replies.body:
Make every person on this planet smart. (so everyone would understand, there is no need in wars, terrorism, religions, money. We would organize the ideal society.Technologies and healthcare would get a boost, so all diseases would be treated.)
Other two wishes I'll save for the future.
